title: Source code of data preprocessing steps for grasshoppers, butterflies and moths for use in WWF Living Planet Index calculations
description: This archive provides the source code of of data preprocessing steps for grasshoppers, butterflies and moths for use in WWF Living Planet Index calculations. The preprocessing steps are written in R markdown (which contains both R code and explanatory text) and also available as rendered pdf or html technical reports.

creators.name: Van Calster, Hans
creators.affiliation: Research Institute for Nature and Forest
